title: Larba
text:
Larba () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a settlement) in Larbinsky Selsoviet of <a href="Tyndinsky%20District">Tyndinsky District</a>, <a href="Amur%20Oblast">Amur Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 416 as of 2018. There are 6 streets.
Geography.
Larba is located by the <a href="Nyukzha">Nyukzha</a> river, 136 km northwest of <a href="Tynda">Tynda</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Khorogochi is the nearest rural locality.
